analysis.description:

	External calls:
	- receiver.tokenFallback(msg.sender,_value,_data) (/unique_chucks/45/0x66a0ef2721a4028448f68823d24ac07eaed4e5bc.sol#161-162)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/45/0x66a0ef2721a4028448f68823d24ac07eaed4e5bc.sol#163-165)
	- balances (/unique_chucks/45/0x66a0ef2721a4028448f68823d24ac07eaed4e5bc.sol#165-167)
